title: [1.9]关于/summon凋零之首
author: 无辜的村民
txt_content:
QQ截图20180414225355.png (125.48 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2018-4-14 22:55 上传





请问1.9如何召唤凋零的发射物凋零之首？
实体名难道不是WitherSkull么

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
无辜的村民 发表于 2018-4-14 16:10
这样生成的凋零之首接触不引爆...是什么问题呢？
没问题...都这样
毕竟无运动方向

把后面的改成 0.0,-0.2,0.0
开始移动，撞到东西就炸...

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2018-4-15 08:53 编辑 

当然不是。很早以前就已经改成wither_skull了
/summon wither_skull ~ ~1 ~
它有三个独有的NBT标签：
direction: List of 3 doubles. Should be identical to Motion.
life: Increments each tick when the projectile is not moving; resets to 0 if it moves. Has no effect, though is still saved/read
power: List of 3 doubles that acts like direction but without resistance
仍有问题请追问

replies.txt_content:
